title: Ticket #5918: Update submit include example
description:
From the RUST email:

In manual section 2.5.4, the include directive is documented. The example for executable piped include is a script which does an "ls" of a file glob to generate a list of input file transfers. Since that can now be done with the queue matching syntax, it would be a good idea to update this example to do something that's both useful and in alignment with submit description best practices.
creator: wenger
